history.content:
<md>I was wondering if the [minor application form / declaration of intent to complete the minor](https://berkeley.qualtrics.com/jfe/form/SV_8c4cmKTIinYpVGd) can be accepted/processed in a term when one or more of the required four classes are in progress but at least four will be complete once the term is over. 

In other words, does there have to be a separate term in which one declares between the term in which one finishes at least four courses and the expected graduation term?

I saw this being asked in @6515 but the linked response seemed to be about the timeline for form submission in the event of having more than 4 courses already completed.</md>
history.subject: CS minor declaration clarification
